text: [Ej pajomʙar] Hargiz dar on mascid [ʙa namoz] naist, [zero] soistatar ast dar mascide [ʙa namoz] ʙiisti, ki az ruzi naxust ʙar pojai parhezgori ʙino sudaast. [Ore, mascidi Quʙost] Ki dar on, mardone hastand, ki dust medorand, ki [az gunohu oludagi] poku pokiza gardand. Va Alloh taolo pokizagonro dust medorad
